channel.title: Official usernames
channel.description:
Hey guys,
So, as I understand, the official Moparcraft server is a cracked one, yes? Meaning that anyone can use any username as chosen on these forums.
However, what is the policy if someone has taken a username, then the person who owns the genuine account turns up? Someone has registered and is playing the server under the name "Flenix" - an account I've had since Alpha.
Now, generally I wouldn't care, but its Minecraft. In Minecraft, I'm a server admin for over 18 months, I've written plenty of plugins, designed a texture pack, I do hi-res skins for Spoutcraft... I just don't want people seeing this guy and thinking he is me is all. So is there any way to correct this?

item.title: Official usernames
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Well, there is no other Flenix from what I can tell, perhaps you’re signing in incorrectly?

See this:

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,492512.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Official usernames
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“Flenix1, post:3, topic:445261”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=547941.msg4018293#msg4018293 date=1339807718]
Unless you actually wish to play the Moparcraft server, I doubt we will address this. More to the point I cannot find a person registered to the name ‘Flenix’ on the forums, are you sure you are logging in correctly?
[/quote]

I couldn’t find one either, but I only registered today and it told me the username was taken in both places…[/quote]

If it’s a genuine issue where an inactive user has taken a legitimate person’s username, I’m sure we can make an arrangement to remove the inactive user’s minecraft name.

Read full topic

item.title: Official usernames
item.dc:creator: @Flenix1 Flenix1
item.description:
@Flenix1 wrote:

Phaze One:

Unless you actually wish to play the Moparcraft server, I doubt we will address this. More to the point I cannot find a person registered to the name ‘Flenix’ on the forums, are you sure you are logging in correctly?

I couldn’t find one either, but I only registered today and it told me the username was taken in both places…

Read full topic
